title: Disqualifies candidates who fail to comply with financial disclosure filing requirements of the public officers law
summary: Provides that a person shall be disqualified from an election for which the filing of an annual statement of financial disclosure is required if such person fails to make a timely filing of such financial disclosure statement; provides a method for the filling of vacancies which occur as a result of such disqualifications.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to disqualification of candidates who fail to file personal financial disclosure statements
